name: The Unreal Spider-Man
description:
A Spider-Man style web swing simulator game in the first person perspective made by a single person. The game uses its first-person perspective for realistic physics and momentum based web swinging. Made using the Unreal Engine 4.

~ Controls ~

Move using WASD. Press TAB to go into SpiderMode. Use M1 and M2 to shoot webs. Jumping with SPACE lets go of webs. Holding LEFT CTRL during SpiderMode charges jump. During SpiderMode you can sprint by holding LEFT SHIFT. Press F to web launch. A well-timed jump after swinging gives a boost. Upon approaching a wall you will automatically wallride use SPACE to get off of wall or use SPACE + A or D to jump left for right. Holding LEFT ALT allows for free look.
